DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to describe an individual's capacity to conceive or to induce conception.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The capacity to conceive or to induce conception. It may refer to either the male or female._A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The capacity to conceive or to induce conception. It may refer to either the male or female.

Concepts.definition: The ability of an individual to produce offspring.

Property.preferredDefinition: an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Testicular Enrollment form per request by T.Lichtenberg. mc 9/13/13

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Category; used informally to mean a class of things.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

PermissibleValues.value: Did not achieve pregnancy following > or = 12 months of unprotected intercourse
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Pregnancy Not Successful With Unprotected Sexual Intercourse

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Pregnancy Not Successful With Unprotected Sexual Intercourse
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Sexual intercourse without the use of precautions to prevent conception or the transmission of sexually transmitted diseases.: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.: An event that accomplishes its intended purpose.: The state or condition of having a developing embryo or fetus in the body (uterus), after union of an ovum and spermatozoon, during the period from conception to birth.

Concepts.definition: Sexual intercourse without the use of precautions to prevent conception or the transmission of sexually transmitted diseases.
An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
An event that accomplishes its intended purpose.
The state or condition of having a developing embryo or fetus in the body (uterus), after union of an ovum and spermatozoon, during the period from conception to birth.

PermissibleValues.value: Fathered > or = 1 child by unspecified method

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not stated explicitly or in detail.: Fertilization of an ovum by a spermatozoon resulting in formation of a viable zygote.: An event that accomplishes its intended purpose.: The generation of offspring by living organisms.

Concepts.definition: Not stated explicitly or in detail.
Fertilization of an ovum by a spermatozoon resulting in formation of a viable zygote.
An event that accomplishes its intended purpose.
The generation of offspring by living organisms.

PermissibleValues.value: Fathered > or = 1 child by assisted reproduction

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The act of contributing to the fulfillment of a need or furtherance of an effort.: Fertilization of an ovum by a spermatozoon resulting in formation of a viable zygote.: An event that accomplishes its intended purpose.: The generation of offspring by living organisms.

Concepts.definition: The act of contributing to the fulfillment of a need or furtherance of an effort.
Fertilization of an ovum by a spermatozoon resulting in formation of a viable zygote.
An event that accomplishes its intended purpose.
The generation of offspring by living organisms.

PermissibleValues.value: Fathered > or = 1 child by natural conception

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A description for something that exists in or is produced by nature, and is not artificial or man-made.: Fertilization of an ovum by a spermatozoon resulting in formation of a viable zygote.: An event that accomplishes its intended purpose.: The generation of offspring by living organisms.

Concepts.definition: A description for something that exists in or is produced by nature, and is not artificial or man-made.
Fertilization of an ovum by a spermatozoon resulting in formation of a viable zygote.
An event that accomplishes its intended purpose.
The generation of offspring by living organisms.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.: An activity intended to do or accomplish something.  Routinely used as in "number of tries to complete a procedure".: The generation of offspring by living organisms.

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
An activity intended to do or accomplish something.  Routinely used as in "number of tries to complete a procedure".
The generation of offspring by living organisms.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

Concepts.definition: A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.
